exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params naertsi : no_append_entries_replies_to_self_interface h : name net : network st' : name -> data ps' : list packet out : list raft_output d : raft_data l : list (name * msg) client : clientId id : nat c : input H : handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) H0 : forall leader : Net.name, type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (nwState net leader)) leader 0 = maxIndex (log (nwState net leader)) H1 : raft_intermediate_reachable net H2 : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h' H3 : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \\/ In p' (send_packets h l) leader : Net.name H4 : type (nwState {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} leader) = Leader Unable to unify "handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l)" with "assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (nwState {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} leader)) leader 0 = maxIndex (log (nwState {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} leader))".

original: intros. unfold raft_net_invariant_client_request. intros. unfold match_index_leader in *. intros. apply H.
